## Last Week: Visualisation

```{r echo = FALSE, out.width = "10%"}
include_graphics("../figures/ggplot.png")
```

<div class="columns-2">
```{r out.width="80%", message = FALSE}
ggplot(data = mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = class)) + 
  geom_smooth()

ggplot(data = mpg) + 
  geom_violin(aes(x = class, y = hwy, 
                  fill = class))
```
</div>

## The Big Mess

```{r, include = FALSE}
data <- read.csv("../Day_1/bigmess.csv", header = TRUE)
```


<div class="columns-2">
```{r out.width="80%"}
ggplot(data = data, aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_point()

ggplot(data = data, aes(x = dataset, y = x)) + 
  geom_boxplot()

```
</div>

## The Solution?

## The Solution

```{r}

ggplot(data = data, aes(x, y)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = dataset)) +
  facet_wrap(~ dataset)


```
